plugin.name: hubspot
plugin.description: Access HubSpot CRM data including contacts, deals, companies, and activity timelines
plugin.context: Use for retrieving contact information, viewing deal pipelines, accessing customer activity history, searching CRM records, and integrating HubSpot customer data with agent workflows

get_contact.description: Retrieve detailed contact information by ID or email address
get_contact.usage_context: Use when you need to look up a specific contact's details, properties, or recent activity summary. Can search by contact ID or email address.

contact_identifier.description: The contact ID or email address to look up

properties.description: Optional: List of specific contact properties to retrieve (e.g., ['firstname', 'lastname', 'phone', 'company']). If not specified, returns all properties.

include_associations.description: Include associated records like companies and deals (default: false)

output_schema.description: Contact information with properties and optional associations

output_guidance.success_description: Returns contact information with properties and optional associations

common_errors.contact_not_found: Contact not found. Verify the contact ID or email address is correct.
common_errors.invalid_property: One or more requested properties do not exist. Check property names.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: HubSpot API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to access contact data. Contact may require additional scopes.

get_contact_deals.description: Get all deals associated with a specific contact
get_contact_deals.usage_context: Use to view a contact's deal pipeline, including deal amounts, stages, close dates, and deal ownership. Useful for understanding a contact's revenue opportunities.

limit.description: Maximum number of deals to retrieve (default: 50, max: 100)

include_deal_details.description: Include full deal properties like amount, stage, close date, and owner (default: true)

deal_properties.description: Optional: Specific deal properties to retrieve (e.g., ['dealname', 'amount', 'dealstage', 'closedate'])

max_limit.message: Limit cannot exceed 100 deals per request. Please use a smaller limit or make multiple requests.

output_guidance.success_description: Returns deals associated with the contact including amounts and stages

common_errors.contact_not_found: Contact ID not found. Verify the contact exists in HubSpot.
common_errors.no_deals_found: No deals are associated with this contact.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: HubSpot API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to access deal data.

get_contact_activities.description: Retrieve recent activities and engagement history for a contact
get_contact_activities.usage_context: Use to view interaction timeline including calls, emails, notes, meetings, and tasks. Essential for understanding contact engagement and communication history.

activity_types.description: Types of activities to retrieve (options: 'calls', 'emails', 'notes', 'meetings', 'tasks'). Default: all types

limit.description: Maximum number of activities to retrieve per type (default: 25, max: 100)

since_date.description: Optional: Only retrieve activities after this date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

max_limit.message: Limit cannot exceed 100 activities per type. Please use a smaller limit.

activities.description: Array of activities sorted by date (newest first)

type.description: Activity type (calls, emails, notes, meetings, tasks)

output_guidance.success_description: Returns activities chronologically with counts by type

common_errors.contact_not_found: Contact ID not found. Verify the contact exists in HubSpot.
common_errors.no_activities_found: No activities found for this contact matching the specified criteria.
common_errors.invalid_date_format: Invalid date format. Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
common_errors.api_rate_limit: HubSpot API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to access engagement data.

search_contacts.description: Search for contacts using filters and query terms
search_contacts.usage_context: Use to find contacts matching specific criteria such as name, email, company, job title, or custom properties. Supports flexible filtering for LLM-driven queries.

query.description: Search query term (searches across name, email, and company fields)

filters.description: Property filters as key-value pairs (e.g., {'company': 'Acme Corp', 'lifecyclestage': 'customer'})

limit.description: Maximum number of contacts to return (default: 25, max: 100)

properties.description: Specific properties to retrieve for each contact (e.g., ['firstname', 'lastname', 'email', 'company'])

max_limit.message: Limit cannot exceed 100 contacts per search. Please use a smaller limit or refine your search.

requires_criteria.message: Search requires either a query term or at least one filter. Please provide search criteria.

common_errors.no_results_found: No contacts found matching the search criteria. Try broadening your search terms or filters.
common_errors.invalid_filter_property: One or more filter properties do not exist in HubSpot. Check property names.
common_errors.invalid_sort_property: The specified sort property does not exist or cannot be used for sorting.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: HubSpot API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to search contacts.

get_deal.description: Get detailed information about a specific deal
get_deal.usage_context: Use to retrieve comprehensive deal information including amount, stage, close date, associated contacts, companies, and deal properties. Useful for deep-diving into specific opportunities.

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to retrieve

properties.description: Optional: Specific deal properties to retrieve (e.g., ['dealname', 'amount', 'dealstage', 'closedate', 'pipeline'])

include_associations.description: Include associated contacts and companies (default: true)

output_guidance.success_description: Returns deal information with properties and associations

common_errors.deal_not_found: Deal ID not found. Verify the deal exists in HubSpot.
common_errors.invalid_property: One or more requested properties do not exist. Check property names.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: HubSpot API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to access deal data.
